mansionBandit.gameView
Interface SurfaceStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
BackWallStrategy, SideWallStrategy, TopBottomStrategy
public interface SurfaceStrategy

SurfaceStrategy handles drawing each 'surface' in the game

Author:
Andy

Method Summary
 GameMatter findObject(int x, int y)
          searches this surface to see if object has been clicked
 void paintSurface(java.awt.Graphics g)
          paint the surface to the graphics object
 void setupSurface(Surface surface, Face direction)
          sets up the strategy with all the objects, images, and coordinates it needs to display the surface correctly

searches this surface to see if object has been clicked

Returns:

setupSurface

void setupSurface(Surface surface,
                  Face direction)
sets up the strategy with all the objects, images, and coordinates it needs to display the surface correctly

Parameters:
surface - the surface to draw
direction - the direction of the surface
